statements: SELECT * FROM shipment_status ORDER BY delivery_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT shipment_id, status FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'delivered'
SELECT * FROM shipment_status WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT order_id, status, delivery_date FROM shipment_status ORDER BY order_id DESC
SELECT shipment_id, status FROM shipment_status WHERE order_id = 'abcd-1234'
SELECT * FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, status FROM shipment_status WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shipment_status WHERE order_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT shipment_id, status, delivery_date FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shipments, status FROM shipment_status GROUP BY status HAVING status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM shipment_status WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, status FROM shipment_status WHERE order_id=1002;
SELECT timeline_id, shipment_id, estimated_delivery_date FROM delivery_timelines WHERE estimated_delivery_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shipment_status ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, status, timestamp FROM shipment_status WHERE status='Delivered' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_timelines WHERE shipment_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, status FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, estimated_delivery_date AS estimated_date, actual_delivery_date AS actual_date FROM delivery_timelines WHERE estimated_delivery_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT shipment_id, order_id, status, timestamp FROM shipment_status JOIN delivery_timelines ON shipment_status.shipment_id = delivery_timelines.shipment_id WHERE estimated_delivery_date > actual_delivery_date;
SELECT MAX(shipment_id) AS max_shipment_id, MIN(order_id) AS min_order_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM shipment_status;
SELECT * FROM shipment_status;
SELECT shipment_id, status FROM shipment_status ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, expected_delivery_date, actual_delivery_date FROM delivery_timelines WHERE actual_delivery_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT shipment_id, status, last_updated FROM shipment_status JOIN delivery_timelines ON shipment_status.shipment_id = delivery_timelines.shipment_id;
SELECT * FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_name, s.status FROM orders o JOIN shipment_status s ON o.shipment_id = s.shipment_id WHERE s.status = 'In Transit';
SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_name, t.expected_delivery_date FROM orders o JOIN delivery_timelines t ON o.shipment_id = t.shipment_id ORDER BY t.expected_delivery_date ASC;

SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_name, t.actual_delivery_date FROM orders o JOIN delivery_timelines t ON o.shipment_id = t.shipment_id WHERE t.actual_delivery_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.actual_delivery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_status;
SELECT order_id, status FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, status FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_timelines;
SELECT timeline_id, shipment_id, estimated_time FROM delivery_timelines WHERE estimated_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shipment_status ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, status FROM shipment_status WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Complete';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM delivery_timelines WHERE estimated_time <= now() ORDER BY actual_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT order_id, status FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT shipment_id, location, status FROM delivery_status WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, status, estimated_delivery_date, actual_delivery_date FROM shipments WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT customer_name, email, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id;
